Package space.sunqian.common.net.udp

Class UdpServerBuilder

java.lang.Object
space.sunqian.common.net.udp.UdpServerBuilder
public class UdpServerBuilder extends Object
Builder for building new instances of UdpServer by DatagramChannel.

The server built by this builder requires a main thread which is responsible for receiving datagram.

  • Method Details

    • handler

      @Nonnull public @Nonnull UdpServerBuilder handler(@Nonnull @Nonnull UdpServerHandler handler)
      Sets the handler to handle server events. The default handler is UdpServerHandler.nullHandler().
      Parameters:
      handler - the handler to handle server events
      Returns:
      this builder

    • mainThreadFactory

      @Nonnull public @Nonnull UdpServerBuilder mainThreadFactory(@Nonnull @Nonnull ThreadFactory mainThreadFactory)
      Sets the main thread factory to create main thread. The main thread is responsible for accepting new client, and then the worker thread will take over the already connected clients.

      If the factory is not configured, the server will use Thread(Runnable).

      Parameters:
      mainThreadFactory - the main thread factory
      Returns:
      this builder

    • maxPacketSize

      @Nonnull public @Nonnull UdpServerBuilder maxPacketSize(int maxPacketSize) throws IllegalArgumentException
      Sets the max data packet size this server can receive. The default is IOKit.bufferSize().
      Parameters:
      maxPacketSize - the max data packet size
      Returns:
      this builder
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - If the max packet size is less than 1

    • socketOption

      @Nonnull public <T> @Nonnull UdpServerBuilder socketOption(@Nonnull @Nonnull SocketOption<T> name, T value) throws NetException
      Sets a socket option. This method can be invoked multiple times to set different socket options.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of the socket option value
      Parameters:
      name - the socket option
      value - the value of the socket option, a value of null may be a valid value for some socket options.
      Returns:
      this builder
      Throws:
      NetException - If an error occurs
      See Also:
      • StandardSocketOptions

    • bind

      @Nonnull public @Nonnull UdpServer bind() throws NetException
      Binds the server's socket to the automatically assigned address and configures the socket to listen for connections. And a new UdpServer instance is returned.
      Returns:
      a new UdpServer instance
      Throws:
      NetException - If an error occurs

    • bind

      @Nonnull public @Nonnull UdpServer bind(@Nullable @Nullable InetSocketAddress localAddress) throws NetException
      Binds the server's socket to the specified local address and configures the socket to listen for connections. And a new UdpServer instance is returned.
      Parameters:
      localAddress - the local address the server is bound to, may be null to bind to the automatically assigned address
      Returns:
      a new UdpServer instance
      Throws:
      NetException - If an error occurs
